GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

  • YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL FOR THE EYES IN THE CLOSET. IF YOU SEE EYES TURN OFF THE LIGHT AND KEEP OFF UNTIL HE'S GONE.
  • IN LEFT SIDE OF THE ROOM YOU HAVE TO LISTEN FOR BREATHING, IF YOU HEAR TURN OFF THE LAMP.
  • YOU HAVE TO CHECK WINDOW OFTEN. IF YOU SEE THE MONSTER USE YOUR FLASHLIGHT AND DON'T TURN OFF UNTIL HE'S GONE.
  • YOU CAN REFILL YOUR FLASHLIGHT BATTERIES IN DRAWER IF YOUR LAMP LIGHT ON.
  • YOU ALSO BE CAREFUL FOR YOUR SANITY METER. IN DARKNESS YOUR SANITY METER WILL INCREASE. FLASHLIGHT ISN'T DECREASE YOUR SANITY METER.
  • SURVIVE UNTIL 7 AM.
